Author: davidriot
Text: I read this post as I finished my third ice-cream, sitting on my bed, ready to purge. my god, I feel like I could have written this post. it's hard, knowing all the times I tell myself no more, no more, no more, they're all in vain. I don't feel anything besides the desire for more....   I'm really sorry. it feels impossible. I hope things start to look up soon for you ‚ô•Ô∏è
